remarks: Well-Founded Induction Schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2011.)
statement:
wfis2fg.1 $e |- F/ y ps $.
wfis2fg.2 $e |- ( y = z -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
wfis2fg.3 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) ps -> ph ) ) $.
wfis2fg $p |- ( ( R We A /\ R Se A ) -> A. y e. A ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
